Did you have them loaded as binary projects before the checkout?
yes. I was trying to replace them with the checked out version.
So did I. However deleting them did not help

Since I already have a bug for the first problem (see bug 59430), I forwarding 
this to core to handle the deletion problem.
Michael, can you explain what "the deletion problem" is?

If a project is deleted, the rules factory for the project is not removed. If 
the project is recreated, it would use the old rule factory. This is not as 
serious as the CVS part of this bug (which I have fixed) so it is not really 
critical anymore. It's really just a cleanup issue.
Fixed.  Rule factories are now discarded after project delete, close, and move.
*** Bug 68812 has been marked as a duplicate of this bug. ***
